parentalConsent.title: Welcome to LogiKids
parentalConsent.intro: LogiKids uses AI to generate personalized learning tasks for your child.
parentalConsent.privacyExplained: Unlike most apps, all your child's data is stored exclusively on your device. We use zero-knowledge encryption, which means even we cannot see your data - only you hold the keys.
parentalConsent.privacyBackup: Optional cloud backup is available for convenience, but it's always encrypted on your device before being sent. The server only stores encrypted blobs that are meaningless without your key.
parentalConsent.aiExplained: Every task is dynamically generated by AI to match your child's age, grade level, and learning pace. Content adapts to their progress, providing the right level of challenge at the right time.
parentalConsent.contentExplained: Our AI prompts are specifically designed to generate educational content appropriate for your child's age and grade level. While we instruct the AI to create safe, learning-focused content, we recommend parental supervision as with any educational tool.
parentalConsent.complianceExplained: Full compliance with GDPR regulations and the EU AI Act. You have the right to access, export, or delete all data at any time. No third-party data sharing, ever.
parentalConsent.inviteExplained: LogiKids is currently in closed beta. Please enter the invite code you received to continue.
parentalConsent.consentCheckbox: I am a parent/guardian and confirm that I have read and understood the above information. I understand that this app uses AI to generate educational content and I agree to provide appropriate parental supervision during use.
